roleset.name: act against with malicious ill will
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls.

example.name: from BOLT
example.text: She invigorated the far right wingers to actually go out and campaign for McCain , instead of apathetically voting for McCain *PRO* to spite Obama .

example.name: All args
example.text: Pray for His soul that he be in the arms of the Angels and *PRO* do not spite him for his shortcomings.
